profile.bio: Expat Brit. #clouderati. Mac, F1 & ManUtd fan. Liberal. Atheist. Cloud computing at Cisco. (Tweets are my own.) Ex-Sun, Amazon, Huawei, Yahoo, USVP, Brocade.
